name: Love's Hella Punk
storyline:
"Please marry me".

I was just proposed to by the worst yankee at school, Shima Tengoku!

I would never love such a man! I hate dyed blonde hair, I despise piercings, and over all, I don't want to date a man who gets involved in fights!

No matter how much I refuse, one question won't stop popping up in my mind....

Why do you like me so much...?
summary: Love's Hella Punk is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are a good-natured and peace-seeking high school girl whose world is flipped upside down when a bad boy delinquent proposes to you out of the blue. Daily bombarded by his infatuation for you, he is the only thing on your mind – for better or worse.
